body_html: This is correct. We currently do not support AWS GPU instances because of their 3.0 cuda compute capability. You can try disabling that requirement in the source code and seeing if it works for you.
body_text: This is correct.  We currently do not support AWS GPU instances because of their 3.0 cuda compute capability.  You can try disabling that requirement in the source code and seeing if it works for you.
body: This is correct.  We currently do not support AWS GPU instances because of their 3.0 cuda compute capability.  You can try disabling that requirement in the source code and seeing if it works for you.
